definition: to think to oneself/to think/to assume
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!

sentences.english: I have one cent, he said. It is an American coin.
sentences.chinese: 他心想，我有一分錢呢，一枚美元硬幣。

sentences.english: The boy aims at becoming an agriculturist .
sentences.chinese: 男孩一心想成爲農學家。

sentences.english: Why should that apple always descend perpendicularly to the ground, thought he to himself ... Why should it not go sideways,or upwards?
sentences.chinese: 他心想，爲什麼蘋果總是垂直落到地面？

sentences.english: I had promised her a candle if she sent me money; and really, who could say that the prayer hadn’t come true?
sentences.chinese: 真的，誰敢說禱告了不能心想事成呢？

sentences.english: But Jenny has her heart set on attending one of the new college programs for students with intellectual disabilities.
sentences.chinese: 但珍妮一心想進爲智障學生新開設的大學班。

sentences.english: Jack seems bent on becoming a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 傑克似乎一心想成爲一名醫生。

sentences.english: I gaped , thinking at first that he must be doing some kind of comedy act.
sentences.chinese: 我打了個哈欠，我開始心想他肯定是做了搞笑的事情。

sentences.english: Jia trinity thought let li guess marry small treasure, yellow fragrant flower let him go to ask guess.
sentences.chinese: 賈三一心想讓李猜猜嫁給小寶，黃香花讓他去問猜猜。

sentences.english: I was thinking to myself, that this person must be a re-enactor or something walking around.
sentences.chinese: 我心想，這肯定是個喜劇演員或者類似的什麼人。

sentences.english: The Prince was PageRankeoccupied with revenge.
She doesn’t know what it’s like, I thought.
sentences.chinese: 她不知道那是什麼滋味，我心想。

sentences.english: Why the Buddha? Because Buddhas, Tathagatas, have cosmic bodies, and so enter into the meditating mind of each sentient being.
sentences.chinese: 所以者何？諸佛如來，是法界身，入一切衆生心想中。

sentences.english: The rich man's wealth is his strong city, and as an high wall in his own conceit.
sentences.chinese: 富足人的財物，是他的堅城，在他心想，猶如高牆。

sentences.english: She says she loves the hyped-up adrenaline feeling of trying to beat an opponent.
sentences.chinese: 她說自己比賽時特別亢奮，一心想着打敗對手。

sentences.english: This surely would end it, thought Tess.
sentences.chinese: 苔絲心想，這場完了就該散場了。

sentences.english: Wang read, thought is truly understand.
sentences.chinese: 王冕看書，心想也着實明白了。

definition: interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!)/to sigh
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
if it were not for/but for
household dish, implement or furniture/domestic animal/(coll.) guy/chap/weapon
erhua variant of 哥們|哥们[ge1 men5]
